definitions.definition: (of a person) reserved or uncommunicative in speech; saying little.
examples: untalkative, uncommunicative, reticent, unforthcoming, quiet, secretive, tight-lipped, buttoned-up, close-mouthed; Moresilent, mute, dumb, inarticulate; reserved, withdrawn "our taciturn daughter has suddenly become a little chatty"Moresilent, mute, dumb, inarticulate; reserved, withdrawn our taciturn daughter has suddenly become a little chatty
